ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without fighting
ygData.msgSnippet: I play on Torvinollis (sp?).  I made my way to Freeport last night. What a trip. Denis Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA) Network Administrator, CAE,
ygData.messageBody:
I play on Torvinollis (sp?).  I made my way to Freeport last night. What a trip.
 
Denis
 

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
810-231-9373, ext. 229
dbaldwin@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Tachibana Ukyo [mailto:silence@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 4:20 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without fighting

Denis,
 
What server do you play on?  If you play on Bertox, I'd be more than happy to help you out, or port you somewhere else for free.  We could probably find you a better weapon as well!  If you want hand to hand you should have been a monk!  =)
 
Masonus Stormcaller
 
 
"Although we modern persons tend to take our electric lights, radios, mixers, etc. for granted, hundreds of years ago people did not have any of these things, which is just as well because there was no place to plug them in."
----- Original Message -----
From: Denis A. Baldwin
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 1526
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without fighting

From fighting hand to hand and kicking so much, my kicks do 12-14 HP and my fists to 8-10. This is 20-24 HP per turn I do bare handed.  Back when I had a sword (and lost my body in Surefall Glade where I still can't find it), I was only doing 12-14 HP of damage. Thus, it's almost easier to stay weoponless.
 
On the other hand, I didn't know the gnoll pups carried weopons.  I will be sure to hunt a couple down and see what I can find.  I've been looking for blues and yellows the whole times (like giant bats) for the experience.
 
Denis
 
 

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
810-231-9373, ext. 229
dbaldwin@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Warden, Kenneth [mailto:kwarden@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 3:23 PM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without fighting

I do not understand why you do not have a weapon? I have played in Qyenos
for many hours if you head to north Qyenos or Qyenos hills the gnoll pups
and decaying skeletons ( both can carry weapons) should con green to you at
lvl 7.

-----Original Message-----
From: Denis A. Baldwin [mailto:dbaldwin@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 3:12 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Ways to gain experience without fighting


Thanks for all of the advice.  I think maybe just being stuck in Qyenos
without a weopon and not being able to find anything that isn't green to me
to kill is what is discouraging me. I head to Surefall and everything is
Red. Are there no more blues or yellows to kill? I'll keep looking, but
thanks for all of the information.

Denis
